bordered.description: Whether the avatar has a border or not

color.description: The background color of the avatar

fallback-src.description: The address of the image that is displayed when the avatar fails to load
fallback-src.description_zh: 头像加载失败时显示的图片的地址

img-props.description: The properties of the img element in the component
img-props.description_zh: 组件中 img 元素的属性

:intersection-observer-options.type: { root?: Element | Document | string | null, rootMargin?: string, threshold?: number | number[]; }
:intersection-observer-options.description_zh: `lazy=true` 时 intersection observer 观测的配置

lazy.description: Whether to start loading after entering the viewport configured in 'intersection-observer-options'
lazy.description_zh: 是否在进入 `intersection-observer-options` 配置的视口之后再开始加载

object-fit.description: The type of adaptation of the avatar image inside the container
object-fit.description_zh: 头像的图片在容器内的的适应类型

round.description: Whether the avatar is round or not

events.name: error
events.description: The callback that is executed when the image of the avatar fails to load
events.description_zh: 头像的图片加载失败执行的回调
